dict.acceptation: 铅笔，彩色铅笔；笔状物；画风，画法；[物]光线锥；

sent.orig: Our main products are student pencil boxes, calculators, pencil bags pencil sharpener and other office articles.
sent.trans: 我公司目前主要生产学生用尺，学具盒、计算机、笔袋、卷笔刀、办公用品等各类产品。

sent.orig: Pencil Blocks are cut into "Pencil Slats."
sent.trans: 铅笔块被切割为“铅笔板”

sent.orig: This is done with a #2 pencil, and a blue Col-erase pencil for the dress.
sent.trans: 这步使用#2铅笔和一个蓝色带橡皮的铅笔画衣服。

sent.orig: The pencil is in the pencil case.
One is a paper and pencil paper -- pencil test. It measures listening and reading skills.
sent.trans: 一种为纸笔考试，用来测试听力和阅读技能。
